title: Block | Affiliate Program | main content | english
content:
If you are a travel blogger or you manage a website dedicated to South American
tourism, the Daytours4u Affiliate Program can help you make some money and add
a new dimension to your brand.
If you are a travel blogger or you manage a website dedicated to South American tourism, the Daytours4u Affiliate Program can help you make some money and add a new dimension to your brand.
If you are a travel blogger or you manage a website dedicated to South American tourism,
the Daytours4u Affiliate Program can help you make some money and add a new dimension
to your brand.
If you are a travel blogger or you manage a website dedicated to South American tourism, the Daytours4u Affiliate Program can help you make some money and add a new dimension to your brand.
Signing up
Once we have received your membership request, we will contact you with information about how to get started.
Embed your links
Incorporate your personalised links into your blog, website, social media profiles, or email signature: wherever you prefer.
Make money
Sales generated by traffic sent to us from your referrals equals’ easy profit for you. We make money, you make money – it’s that simple.

title: Block | Affiliate Program | second content | english
content:
"The great thing about this affiliate programme is that I have the opportunity to share my experiences in Colombia, and also monetise my blog so that I can continue to create high quality content."
Sarah Duncan
"I see two benefits: first, having a reliable company on to which I can forward tour requests that come to me through my blog, and second, being able to make money through this simple process."
Gisele Teixeira
"I am new to the environment of blogging and earning money through my website, but being a part of the Daytours4u Affiliate Programme is proving to be interesting, profitable, and very positive."
Patricio Espigares

title: Block | FAQ | general | english
content:
{{trans "General"}}

{{trans "Are there discounts for booking more than one tour?"}}

{{trans "We usually have special promotions for the booking of two or more activities in Buenos Aires. Please have a look in the Specials section of our website for any deals currently on offer."}}

{{trans "Can I book flights / hotels / car rental through Daytours4u?"}}

{{trans "Bsas4u specialises in independent sightseeing tours, daily excursions, and other cultural activities in the destination and its surroundings. If you want to receive further information about travelling in Argentina, or you need help in planning an all-inclusive vacation, you can find an array of travel articles on our blog."}}

{{trans "Can I book more than one tour in Buenos Aires?"}}

{{trans "Yes, you may book any number of tours from the Bsas4u website, depending on the time you have available. Simply add a new product to your cart. You can also visit the Packages section to book the standard packages we have built according to the previous preferences of our customers. These packages already have the best price-benefit."}}

{{trans "Can I book over the telephone?"}}

{{trans "Our website offers complete and updated information about the tours and activities in our catalogue, and our payment methods adhere to the highest standards to keep your private information safe. Nevertheless, we will be happy to help you with your bookings in the manner you prefer and a member of our team will be able to help you in English, Portuguese, Spanish or French. Our office hours are Monday to Friday from 8am until 8pm, Saturdays from 9am until 2pm."}}

title: Block | FAQ | Argentina | english
content:
{{trans "Argentina"}}

{{trans "Can I book the tour when I get to Buenos Aires?"}}

{{trans "The products and tourist services of Bsas4u can be booked online wherever you are, in Buenos Aires or elsewhere. Our calendar will allow you to book up to two days in advance. Please contact our Support Team to verify availability and book over the telephone."}}

{{trans "I don't know what date I'm travelling yet, can I book a product and leave the date open?"}}

{{trans "We need a specific date to reserve any tour or service offered on our website. If you haven't decided on the specific dates you are going to stay in Buenos Aires, you can book a provisional date for the tour service you want (excluding tickets for football games or any other special events) and subsequently change it up to 3 days before the desired date via email with our Support Team."}}

{{trans "I already paid and I'm not sure if my booking was received. What should I do?"}}

{{trans "You should receive an automatic response from our website confirming that your booking is in process. However, our Operations Team has to confirm this reservation with the tour provider, and, therefore, you should receive a second e-mail within 24 hours of your booking (up to 48 hours on weekends and national holidays) confirming the details of the service including pickup time, customer emergency number, and the voucher of your service. If you haven't received such an email, please check your junk folder or contact us via Chat to verify the status of your order."}}

{{trans "How can I contact you if I have a last minute event/emergency before my tour?"}}

{{trans "You will receive with your voucher, a 24/7 mobile number to call in Buenos Aires in case you need to contact us out of office hours. If your query does not require immediate attention, you should direct it to the Bsas4u Support Team and we will get back to you within the next 24 hours (up to 48 hours on weekends and national holidays)."}}

title: Block | Checkout | after payment | english
content:
What happens after my payment?
After your purchase is completed, you will receive a confirmation email of your payment. If your service is eligible for instant booking, you will receive immediately a voucher of services that contains all the information to successfully receive your service. Otherwise, make sure you will enter all the requested details after payment. These details are necessary to confirm your booking and send you the voucher.
